gritty.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Henin gave a typically gritty performance, coming back from 4–0 down.
gritty.translation[0].definitions[1].def: showing a difficult or unpleasant situation as it really is
gritty.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Billingham’s pictures have a gritty realism which can be almost upsetting.
gritty.translation[0].definitions[2].def: containing grit or covered in grit
gritty.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Gritty soil had got under her nails.
